channel.title: Onscreen updating
channel.description:
Anyone know how to fix this? Happens to most ZDR servers, What it is is, updaterequired and appearance...whatever don't work.
It baisicly means costum objects don't load. I'm sure it has to do with other things, but idc acout those.
Here is my project, and that is the only thing i need before releasing it. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,330415.0.html
Maybe add a few more things though.
Thanks, Kuban.

item.title: Onscreen updating
item.dc:creator: @ry60003333 ry60003333
item.description:
@ry60003333 wrote:

Appearance update has nothing to do with custom objects… that updates the appearance of the player. You obviously have no clue what your doing.

Read full topic
